issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: Thrift Server and Client for Hive

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Clients
components.description: Tracks issues dealing with CLI, Webclient, JDBC clients or other such clients.

components.name: Server Infrastructure
components.description: Tracks issues dealing with Server infrastructure

fields.description:
There is a fair amount of code from the Thrift and fb303 libraries that was
checked into the Hive source tree as part of HIVE-73. This code should be
removed and the odbc driver Makefile should be reworked to depend on the
contents of THRIFT_HOME and FB303_HOME as defined by the user.

{code}
./service/include/thrift/concurrency/Exception.h
./service/include/thrift/concurrency/FunctionRunner.h
./service/include/thrift/concurrency/Monitor.h
./service/include/thrift/concurrency/Mutex.h
./service/include/thrift/concurrency/PosixThreadFactory.h
./service/include/thrift/concurrency/Thread.h

./service/include/thrift/server/TSimpleServer.h

fields.summary: Remove Thrift/FB303 headers/src from Hive source tree

comments.body: Fixed in HIVE-1526 as part of the upgrade to Thrift 0.5.0.
